overview: Ben and Allison a young Caucasian married couple are thriving in their careers. There's only one thing that would make their life perfect. When their wish comes true and they are given the opportunity to officially adopt their fostered African American 9yr. old son, Kyle, they don't second guess it. They do everything they're supposed to, to welcome their new so into ... title: Next of Kin
